name: Waking Dad
description:
Description

This is a short game for a Game Jam at our Uni which was made in 1 week. You play as the son who is trying to make a potion to help your dad get out of a coma. Select the correct Potions and he will wake up, run out of time or give the wrong ones. He won’t be coming back anytime soon. 

Oh and by the way, you only have 60 seconds to beat the game… Good Luck
